title: ServiceNow Integration Pack
details: Implemented bi-directional integration between StackStorm and ServiceNow using REST APIs.
Developed sensors (Incident Sensor, RITM Sensor, Task Sensor) to monitor ServiceNow tables and trigger automation workflows.
Configured both Basic Auth and OAuth authentication with proxies for outgoing integration.
Created webhook mechanism for push based automation from ServiceNow.
Reusable pack designed for multiple client instances with configurable parameters.
Enhanced sensors with lock feature to support multi-node deployments without duplication.
Enabled configurable Filters for flexible monitoring of Incidents.

title: Symphony SummitAI Integration Pack
details: Developed bi-directional communication between StackStorm and Symphony SummitAI via REST APIs.
Configurable authentication using Basic Auth or API Key with support for proxy details.
Implemented actions to create, update, and fetch incidents and service requests.
Pack supports service catalogs, user details lookup.
Designed sensors to track new incidents and service requests with configurable filters.
Reusable, parameter-driven pack to work seamlessly across client environments.

title: BMC Remedy Integration Pack
details: Implemented bi-directional integration between StackStorm and BMC Remedy using REST APIs.
Developed actions for incident and work order management (get, update).
Configured JWT-based authentication with secure token handling for API calls.
Designed sensors (Incident Sensor, Work Order Sensors) to track ticket creation and status changes.
Enabled configurable Filters for flexible monitoring of Remedy forms.
Reusable pack designed to support multiple Remedy environments with minimal configuration.

title: CyberArk Integration Pack
details: Developed integration with CyberArk to securely retrieve credentials using REST APIs.
Implemented support for both PasswordVault and AIMWebService authentication flows.
Configured secure token-based and application-ID based authentication mechanisms.
Created reusable actions to retrieve and manage secrets stored in CyberArk safes.
Pack designed with proxy support and configurable parameters for multi-environment deployments.

title: BeyondTrust Integration Pack
details: Developed integration with BeyondTrust Password Safe to securely retrieve and manage credentials using REST APIs.
Implemented actions to request access, retrieve passwords, and establish privileged sessions for managed accounts.
Configured authentication using API key, session management, and secure sign-out mechanisms.
Enabled configurable duration_minutes for session requests to support different automation use cases.
Pack supports both password retrieval and session-based access with flexible parameters.

title: Azure Key Vault Integration Pack
details: Developed integration with Azure Key Vault for secure management of secrets, keys, and certificates.
Implemented actions to Get Secret and Set Secret with client ID, tenant ID, and certificate-based authentication.
Enabled certificate import/export workflows to support service principal authentication using PKCS certificates.
Designed reusable pack for multiple key vaults with configurable parameters.
Extended support for JWT signing with Azure Key Vault keys for automation use cases.

title: Execution Status Tracker (Reports) Pack
details: Designed and implemented an execution tracking framework for StackStorm actions with support for MongoDB, SQL (MSSQL, MySQL, PostgreSQL, Oracle), and Excel reporting.
Developed scheduled actions to update execution status, generate reports, and send automated email summaries (daily, weekly, monthly).
Implemented detailed database schema for tracking execution metadata such as execution_id, automation_status, use_case_name, and execution_time.
Enabled Excel report generation with trend analysis and summary/detail views for audit and compliance.
Built rules for automated reporting, including execution_status_tracker_db and periodic email notifications.

title: Zscaler Integration Pack
details: Designed and implemented integration between StackStorm and Zscaler Internet Access platform.
Developed automation workflows to manage firewall policies, URL filtering, and IP groups.
Built reusable actions supporting both information retrieval and configuration updates.
Enabled flexible and scalable automation for multiple Zscaler environments.

title: Exchange Online Integration Pack
details: Developed integration between StackStorm and Microsoft Exchange Online to support mailbox and administrative automation.
Implemented secure authentication using Azure AD application credentials (Client ID, Secret, Tenant ID).
Automated Exchange Online administrative tasks such as user management, mailbox configuration, and permissions handling.
Designed reusable and scalable workflows leveraging PowerShell cmdlets for advanced Exchange features.
Enabled communication to streamline collaboration and reduce manual intervention in mailbox operations.

title: Citrix Integration Pack
details: Developed integration between StackStorm and Citrix environments for automated monitoring and management.
Implemented workflows to retrieve machine status, session details, and resource utilization in real time.
Streamlined issue diagnosis by automating collection of connection failures, performance metrics, and logon statistics.
Enabled proactive monitoring of Citrix Virtual Apps and Desktops to reduce downtime and improve user experience.
Designed reusable pack with configurable parameters for seamless adoption across multiple Citrix environments.

title: MongoDB Integration Pack
details: Designed and delivered integration between StackStorm and MongoDB for seamless database automation.
Enabled automated insert, update, and query operations to streamline storage and retrieval of automation data.
Built workflows supporting both structured documents and file management with GridFS.
Improved auditability by automating execution log storage and retrieval across multiple use cases.
Packaged solution as a reusable module with configurable parameters for enterprise-wide adoption.

title: Azure DevOps Integration Pack
details: Developed StackStorm integration with Azure DevOps to automate pipelines, repositories, and project operations.
Enabled dynamic pipeline creation and execution across multiple repositories through reusable workflows.
Pack designed for multi-organization usage with flexible configuration for enterprise teams.

title: InfluxDB Integration Pack
details: Developed StackStorm integration for InfluxDB to enable automated time-series data collection and management.
Implemented workflows to write metrics across buckets and organizations with configurable parameters.
Enhanced observability by integrating InfluxDB actions into automation pipelines for centralized monitoring.
Pack designed for reusability across multiple client environments.

title: O365 Email Integration Pack
details: Developed StackStorm integration with Office 365 for automated email management via Microsoft Graph API.
Implemented actions to read, filter, and classify emails, including new vs. reply detection and batch marking as read.
Built secure workflows for sending emails with support for CC, attachments, and HTML formatting.
Extended automation with attachment retrieval and size-based filtering for enterprise workflows.

title: O365 Email Helpdesk Pack
details: Automated email intake process by monitoring Office 365 mailboxes for new and reply emails.
Enabled automatic incident creation and updates in ServiceNow based on email content.
Designed duplicate check mechanism to prevent re-processing of previously handled emails.
Implemented acknowledgment emails for seamless communication with end users.
Improved helpdesk efficiency by reducing manual intervention in incident logging.
